equipped.name: (a wooden holy symbol on a cord)

mobs.long_desc: One of the Holyguard warriors stands here, at full attention.
mobs.desc: The warrior stands with sword at his side and in full armor.  The thin metal that is used in his plating shines and glistens as if he polishes it every day but also has scratches and dents from previous battles.  He hardly seems to notice you as his eyes peer forward in a trance, waiting for someone or something to attack.

mobs.long_desc: A Haven wallguard paces back and forth, watching you with a weary eye.
mobs.desc: The wallguard is intently watching you, as if trying to calculate your nest move.  His primary job is to guard the wall, and defend it from all that try to invade.  His bulging muscles and his sharp sword seem to be all he needs to protect the town from any evils that might want inside.

mobs.long_desc: The Holyguard Captain is positioned with a sturdy posture, standing tall and proud.
mobs.desc: The captain of the Holyguard is a little larger than the regular guards, but seems to be more agile and a very experienced fighter.  His armor is well suited to defend his body and his sword gleams with a polished surface showing his pride in what he has become.

mobs.long_desc: The Captain of the Haven wallguard surveys the area with an uncanny determination.
mobs.desc: The wallguard captain surveys the area with an intent eye for anything that looks out of place.  She is in top physical shape and is in a well designed armor that covers her most vital body parts.  The look in her eye tells you that she is overbearing with determination and her soul purpose is to guard the stone wall.

mobs.long_desc: A short, stocky man is standing here, looking for something to do.
mobs.desc: The grayish blue pants and vest that this man is wearing is very well worn and shows signs of its age.  He is middled aged with graying hair, but seems very well built for his age.  A small tattoo of a symbol bearing the letters SH is inked into his arm.

mobs.long_desc: A woman clad in a golden dress strolls around, focused on her tasks.
mobs.desc: The woman is intently focused on what ever task she might be trying to finish. She seems to be looking around quite often, as if she is afraid of some sort of attack.  Her dress is worn out and looks to be handmade, giving her the look of a peasant.

mobs.long_desc: A small, muscular boy is scurrying around, running an errand for someone.
mobs.desc: The errand boy is in very good shape, as if he is training to become a warrior or a Paladin.  His clothing is somewhat ragged and he is wearing no shoes.  He is carrying a small sheath on his belt, which looks to be holding a rusty dagger.

mobs.long_desc: A training paladin is holding a stance, with sword and shield in hand.
mobs.desc: The trainee is a young man that is in top physical shape.  His muscles are well defined and he is very quick with his movements.  His blue armor is not made from metal, but looks to be thick reinforced leather.  His sword is exceptionally polished although he looks to have been through much training.

mobs.long_desc: Lewish the master Paladin is here, waiting for his next training class.
mobs.desc: This man stands with an impressive stance holding his sword and shield at his side, waiting to teach his next class.  Lewish is the master Paladin of the Sacred Haven and looking at him you can tell why.  His armor and sword is well used, scars line his arms from previous battles and the look of sheer determination is present in his eyes.

mobs.long_desc: A mighty paladin is walking around, keeping an close eye on his surroundings.
mobs.desc: This paladin has had years of training and endured many battles, for his body shows the results.  His muscle is lean and well defined, his armor and sword are very aged and he is focused without showing any distractions.  He ambles around the Sacred Haven hoping to add to the security of his home.

mobs.long_desc: A mighty paladin is walking around, keeping a watchful eye on her surroundings.
mobs.desc: The dark hair of this lady Paladin is braided in a ponytail that hangs down from under her helmet.  She is well built with very muscular arms and legs from years of training and numerous battles.  She is watching you with an unwavering eye, waiting for you to break the rules of the Sacred Haven.

mobs.long_desc: A sanctuary priest stands here, waiting to offer help to the weary.
mobs.desc: The priest is covered in a flowing gown of white, which drapes down to the floor.  He looks to be very agile yet is built with a thin frame and is holding no obvious weapons.  His primary function is to give moral and religious support to the inhabitants of the Sacred Haven.

mobs.long_desc: Rylee the High Priestess is poised deep in thought while reading a book.
mobs.desc: Rylee's long golden hair flows down around her body, giving her the appearance of wearing some sort of halo.  Her golden robe almost matches the color of her hair and covers most of her body.  She looks to be very frail because she has not trained in the same fashion that the warriors do, but still could be a very worthy opponent.  You notice a small bulge on her right calf, under the robe, as if something is strapped to her leg.

mobs.long_desc: The town overseer is here, reading over some documents in hand.
mobs.desc: The town overseer is dressed in dark brown robes and is in bare feet.  He is studying a few documents and comparing them to some books.  His shoulder length, shady brown hair flows off his head in deep curls.  He hardly seems to notice you as his study seems to consume him.

mobs.long_desc: Cyrus stands backed against the wall, eyeing you with apprehension.
mobs.desc: Standing tall in a full suit of metal and leather armor, Cyrus looks to be a very difficult opponent.  He is well trained in the Paladin ways and his body is very well-developed and in peak physical shape.  The metal shoulder plates that hang down over his arms bear the symbol of the Sacred Haven.  He turns and looks at you with his deep, vivid blue eyes and seems to be peering into your soul.

mobs.long_desc: Belward turns to confront you, then starts to move towards you.
mobs.desc: A great warrior stands here, radiating his confidence in his power and his skills.  He is clad in a combination of metal and leather armor, as if ready to go to battle.  He is the oldest of the two Paladin brothers and with his experience he has brought Sacred Haven to what it has become today.

mobs.long_desc: A poet clad in white robes wanders around, with his eyes buried into a loose bound book.
mobs.desc: The wandering poet mumbles incoherently as he reads from a book in one hand and then switches his gaze to the book in his other hand.  He is clad in a white, loose fitting robe and a set of ragged sandals cover his feet.  The wrinkles on his face give away his age while you notice that his long grayish white hair must have been growing for some time now.  Maybe if you asked him he would share one of his books.

mobs.long_desc: Oloian stands here, holding a vial of bubbling and smoking liquid.
mobs.desc: The lead scientist is clad in a black leather coat and is pouring the liquid from one glass tube into another.  Oloian is small, frail and weak and is lacking any hair upon his head.  He is walking around the room, bantering to himself and only pausing to look at the papers on his desk.

mobs.long_desc: A skinny, pale handler of science stands here with an odd look across his face.
mobs.desc: A ragged apron is all that keeps the body of the handler from the chemicals and body parts that he works with.  He is wearing a short, red hat and it is positioned low down on his brow, wrinkling his small nose.  His hands are calloused and scarred from chemical spills.  He is very skinny and his skin is a pasty white, from lack of sunlight.

mobs.long_desc: A tall treasure keeper is standing here, at full alert and ready to fight.
mobs.desc: The keeper is a strange looking humanoid, standing on two legs and covered in tattered brown canvas clothes.  Its face is mangled with scars and deformed muscles giving it a horrid appearance.  Its body is very solid and the strength of this creature is evident.  A brand looks to be burnt into its calf, bearing the SH mark of the Sacred Haven.  It stands with very little movement and is ready to attack.

mobs.long_desc: A cell Holyguard paces back and fourth, dedicated to guarding the cell doors.
mobs.desc: The guard is clad in golden armor, with muscles bulging and sweat pouring down his cheeks.  He is in top physical shape and has had years of training, bringing him to one of the top positions in the Holyguard ranks, the cell Holyguard.  His main intent is to guard the doors that hold all of the evil prisoners, for use in experiments.

mobs.long_desc: The Guard of the Brotherhood stands at his utmost attention.
mobs.desc: The guard is dressed in a bluish gray armor, consisting of a leather base with the edges trimmed in metal.  A few large scale shaped pieces of metal are sewn onto the chest and back of the armor.  His muscles showcase years of training and he is very good a doing his job.  The look in his green eyes give him an almost trance like nature about him.

mobs.long_desc: The Headguard of the Brotherhood stands against the knee wall, overlooking the situation.
mobs.desc: The headguard is lean and fit, dressed in bluish grey leather armor.  He is standing with full awareness and centered in thought.  His main concern is to protect the remaining brothers of the Sacred Haven.  He watches you closely, ready to spring into action, waiting for any type of violent action.

mobs.long_desc: One of the Holyguard warriors is at full attention, watching everything that comes near.
mobs.desc: The warrior stands with sword at his side and in full armor.  The thin metal that is used in his plating shines and glistens as if he polishes it every day, but it also has scratches and dents from previous battles.  He keeps an watchful eye on you as his eyes peer forward in a trance, waiting for someone or something to attack.

mobs.long_desc: The Holyguard Captain is positioned with a sturdy posture, standing with pride.
mobs.desc: The captain of the Holyguard is a little larger than the regular guards, but seems to be more agile and a very experienced fighter.  His armor is well suited to defend his body and his sword gleams with a polished surface showing his pride in what he has become.

mobs.long_desc: A stout armory guard stands his watch over all that enters.
mobs.desc: The guard has been placed here strictly to protect the armory's door.  His blue armor shines in the candle light and his helm is clad in an assortment of jewels.  His muscles bulge from under his leather armor as he flexes to show you what type of opponent he might be.  It seems that the Sacred Haven has picked only the largest of the guards to hold this position.

mobs.long_desc: An alteration priest stands here, clad in black and chanting some unintelligible mantras.
mobs.desc: The priest is dressed in jet black robes and his face is furrowed with deep lines and wrinkles.  His white hair drapes halfway down his back and is lashed in a braid with beaded ties.  He is holding a book in one hand and a vial in the other.  The look of iniquity beams from his pale grey eyes, giving you the chills.

mobs.long_desc: The Holy Avenger shows his presence, glaring at you with an icy stare.
mobs.desc: The Holy Avenger is covered in brilliant white hair, with light colored golden wings protruding out of its back.  It stands on two legs that are extremely thick and muscular.  Razor sharp claws extend from its hands and feet.  It quickly scans the room, looking for intruders and all that oppose its holy vengeance.

mobs.long_desc: A dark robed figure mulls around, with its hood hanging down mysteriously over his face.
mobs.desc: The dark robe of the figure flows down around its body and drags the ground, concealing its true identity.  Only its hands are visible and they are very grayish in color, with a few dull stone bracelets wrapped tightly around the wrists.  The hood of the robe is pulled way down around its face, creating a shadow inside of it that gives the appearance that there is no face under the hood.

mobs.long_desc: The principle conversion priest quickly looks up from his task and glares coldly at you.
mobs.desc: The eyes of the conversion priest are a shadowy black color, with no white showing.  His pale skin shows no evidence of ever seeing the light of day and you smell a rank stench coming from him.  He is wearing a tattered black robe, which is tied together with a golden belt bearing a pale silver SH casting on the buckle.

mobs.long_desc: A slobbering Trecor crouches in the corner, twitching and quivering with fear.
mobs.desc: The trecor is a fierce looking beast with four spine covered legs sprouting out of a thick-shelled, armored body.  It is a deep, dark red color and its four eyes are a brilliant yellow and set on top of a stalk that rises out of its head.  The body is shaped like an oval, with the legs on the bottom and the two arms jutting out of the sides.  The arms end in a ball of spikes, which look to be very sharp.  It looks to be a vicious fighter, but it cowers in the corner, shaking with fear.

mobs.long_desc: An evil looking Yertan scampers around the room, clawing anything near it.
mobs.desc: The large brute is long and slender, with eight legs growing from its cylinder-shaped body.  It resembles a caterpillar, but it's much larger and its legs are very long, raising its body a couple of feet off the ground.  On the end of its legs is a single long claw.  Its body is colored black with brilliant blue streaks that run along the side of its body.  The Yertan's head is jointed at the neck and extends from the body, with a large set of jaws poised ready to clamp onto anything in its reach.  A long, thin tail drags the ground behind it, occasionally flipping into the air.

mobs.long_desc: A cowering prisoner rests against the wall, eyeing you with terror.
mobs.desc: The prisoner looks as if he was once a great fighter, with scars and muscles to prove it.  He is giving you the impression that he is scared, but a man of this size would have to have been through a great deal of oppression to bring him down to the fragile state he is in now.  He is only wearing a tattered shirt and pants, and his bare feet are calloused from the stone floor.  He is leaning against the wall, hardly moving and keeping his eyes on you at all times.

mobs.long_desc: A blazrik stands here, with an empty expression on its face.
mobs.desc: The blazrik has been created by the Sacred Haven scientists and alteration priests in order to give the Paladins a practice opponent.  It is clad in a pale grey armor and stands motionless, awaiting a command.  Its face is a blur of color and you can't make out any distinguishing features except the eyes, which burn with a deep red glow.  Its muscles are evident through its armor and it is shaped like a human, standing on two feet.

mobs.long_desc: A turyt wanders around, eyes scanning the area for any threats.
mobs.desc: The turyt's eyes make contact with yours and it quickly looks away, avoiding your stare.  It is bleeding from several cuts and wounds on its body and the blood that runs from them is a dark black color, seeping down and splattering on the ground.  Its armor is tattered and full of blade marks from its battles. Its body is formed much like a human's, but its face is just a blue oval, dotted with two burning red eyes.

mobs.long_desc: A shadowy figure lurks in the corner, trying to stay out of sight.
mobs.desc: The figure is clad in a black cape, which shimmers in waves of black and grey. His face has a shady complexion and is further darkened by a black eye mask, which helps him to blend into the surroundings.  His feet are very long and pointy, and covered in a coarse black hair.  He backs away from you slowly and attempts to hide in the shadows.

mobs.long_desc: The Sacred Haven AI stands here, slobbering and drooling all over.
mobs.desc: This thing looks pretty stupid to be considered an AI.

mobs.long_desc: A small, weird looking creature crouches in the corner, picking at a piece of flesh held in his hand.
mobs.desc: The creature is standing next to a pile of flesh and trying to stay out of sight.  It is cowering on two feet, with pale and scaly skin that seems to blend in with the environment.  This small humanoid is roughly shaped like a man, but its head, hands and feet are very large for its size.  There is a row of narrow, pointy teeth growing out of its gaping mouth.  Large chunks of flesh are visibly lodged in between the teeth, as it slowly chews on a morsel of meat.

mobs.long_desc: An old man stands leaning on a walking cane, with his hood up over his head.
mobs.desc: The old man's eyes are very shifty, and his dark skin gives away the fact that he is not human.  He is wearing a long robe, which drags the ground behind him. He is loitering around you and almost seems to be following your every move. Only his small, nimble looking hands are visible, and move with an inherent quickness.

mobs.long_desc: A powerful dwarven forgesmith works a red-hot piece of metal over an anvil.
mobs.desc: Hearty and stout like most members of his race, Forgemaster Galen is well suited for his work.  His rich mahogany beard is intricately braided and capped with golden ornaments.  He wears heavy cloth and leather to protect his skin but with enough ventilation to put in the monumental labor necessary to supply the entire haven.  The force with which he swings his hammer is truly awe-inspiring!

objects.ground: A worn out ballcap is lying here.
A &6&bDream&0 Fountain sits here.
A small drop of &1&bblood&0 lies on the ground, emitting a faint trail of smoke.

extras.text: The earring is brilliant red, shimmering in the light.  The material that comprises the red color covers most of the earring except the stud, which is a dull silver color.  It emits a small trail of smoke, which seems to come from the dried on blood that forms the outer layer of the earring.

objects.ground: A brilliant shining broadsword is strewn on the ground.

extras.text: The sword feels light in your hands as you inspect it.  There are many scratches and dents in it, but it remains razor sharp to the touch.  The gleaming metal that it has been forged from is superior to most other materials used for swords.  The handle is layered in gold and silver, with very detailed designs of ivy leaves.  There is an inscription on the handle.
Melted together from the swords of three brothers, mixed and forged into two, for the lost third brother will forever be remembered.

objects.ground: A rusted key lies on the ground, almost out of sight.

extras.text: The rusted key is flaking off metal in spots, giving it a very rough feel. The wooden handle is cracked and splintered, as if the key has seen a lot of use.

objects.ground: A grey stone key lies here, almost out of sight.

extras.text: The key is carved of a dull grey stone, and seems to be well worn at the edges.  It is rather large and heavy, being that it is made from stone.

objects.ground: A tattered and worn out leather bound book stands on end.

extras.text: The worn out leather book binding is almost falling apart.  It is very old and the leather is well oiled from being handed by unclean hands.  The pages in the book are hand written with a variety of inks giving light to the idea that the pages were written on different days as if a journal would be.  You can read a few of the first pages: page1, page2 and page3.

For all that are powerful Bringing fists down on the weak Smashing their souls And breaking the meek May they soon meet their maker Brought forth for their misdeed Wrought down into the ground Stomped flat their greed For soon the good will arise And bring evil to its end Stop our troubled existence Then let us to ascend

The quaint sounds of spring fill my ears with a joy not found else where. The breeze showers my skin with the sensations of the air.  This feeling empowers me with the creativity that is unrivaled by others.  Like floating on top of the world without the weight of gravity to pull me down.

............THOUGHTS............ Thoughts drain like water Down into the consciousness Collected in a small form Then spread out to be recollected Rearranged and transformed Until they collide with perfection Forming what would be What could be The greatest thought of them all

objects.ground: A small, stone well is built into the ground, with flowers growing at its base.

extras.text: The small well is built from the same faded, grey stone that encompasses the surrounding wall.  A small wooden roof covers the top of the well, but still allows you to reach down and access the water inside.  As you look in you can see that the water is very shallow and a small carved passage in written in the wood on the cover.  It reads: Take only what you need.

objects.ground: A key with a sky-blue handle rests on the ground.

extras.text: The handle of the large brass key is made of a sky-blue colored stone, with small veins of red that run throughout it.  The handle is well worn and the brass is starting to tarnish.  A small inscription is engraved into the brass.
-The Key Of Cyrus-

objects.ground: A key with handle of fine apatite rests on the ground.

extras.text: The key is crafted with a apatite handle and a golden shank.  It looks to be faded and dirty, due to the amount of use it gets.  A small inscription is carved into the handle.
-The Key Of Belward-

objects.ground: The sparkle of a key resting on the ground catches your eye.

extras.text: The key is forged of a shiny platinum like metal, with the handle part shaped into the letters SH.  The key sparkles in the light, but still seems to be very well used.

objects.ground: A detailed cell key rest upon the ground.
A dagger lies on the ground, its blade gleaming radiantly.

extras.text: This dagger has been made with an exceptional craftsmanship as the handle is hardened wood inlaid with jewels and gold that glistens in the light.  The blade shimmers with a radiant light, reflecting the smallest amounts of light that hit it.

objects.ground: A heap of golden material is lying on the ground, unused at the moment.

extras.text: The golden color of the robe is so close to real gold that is almost seems to be made out of it.  The robe is very durable and appears to be incredibly old. The ends of the sleeves and the neckline are lined with green emeralds that catch and hold the light, reflecting it back out into a greenish haze.  There are no noticeable seams in it, as if it were woven out of a continuous thread.

objects.ground: A loaf of dark wheat bread lies on the ground.

extras.text: The loaf of dark wheat bread has been baked to perfection.  It has a few spices and crushed nuts cooked into the top.  The crispy crust could only be matched by soft, moist insides.

objects.ground: A small, golden badge in the shape of a circle has been dropped on the ground.

extras.text: The badge is formed from solid gold, and is shaped into a circle, enclosing the letters S.  H.  It is very detailed with small leaves and flowers carved into the band forming the circle.  A small inscription is stamped into the gold on the back.
All who wear this badge have served the Sacred Haven with their utmost ability and proven themselves a great asset to the ranks of the holy.

objects.ground: A gleaming longsword has fallen out of use and is lying on the ground.

extras.text: The longsword has seen its time in battle, for the metal is nicked, dented and has some minor spots of rust.  Although the metal is worn and abused, it has been kept very well polished and gleams in the light.  You can see a dried, black substance splattered on the grey cloth of the hilt, and the pommel is scratched and broken.

objects.ground: A brilliant looking blade rests on the ground, amazingly clean for being tossed down.

extras.text: The Blade of Eternity is in perfect condition, with no scratches, dents or evidence of use.  It is shorter than most swords and is marked with runes of some kind down its blade.  The hilt is forged with the blade as one piece making the blade very durable.  An inscription is marked into the guard of the blade.
May the way of the righteous lead your journey

objects.ground: A helm lies on the ground, shimmering in blues and greys.

extras.text: The helm is forged of a silver metal of the highest quality, giving it extreme strength.  It appears to have been painted or layered with a blue colored metallic substance, giving off a bluish tinted shine.  The back of the helm comes down to cover the neckline and at the front there is a piece that drops downward to cover the nasal area.

objects.ground: A large wooden chest bound with gold and silver lies in the middle of the room.

extras.text: The large chest is built of a dark grained wood and is held together with thick bands of gold and silver.  The lid is covered in gemstones and hand carved designs, as well as a layer of dust.  A large black metal lock is fastened to the side and looks to be unbreakable.

objects.ground: A silver chestplate gleams in the light, forgotten on the ground.

extras.text: The chestplate is pure silver in color, radiating in the light and reflecting it back with a bit more intensity.  The metal has been polished and kept very clean, even though there are minor imperfections such as sword marks and small dents.  There are markings along the sides, etched into the metal.  The markings bear the letters SH and are surrounded by runes of some sort.

objects.ground: A large glass case rests in the middle of the room, covered in a think layer of dust.

extras.text: The glass case rests under a layer of dust.  The seams in the glass look to be sealed with silver solder of some kind and there is no apparent latch or lock of any kind.  Inside the case an iridescent glow lights up the walls of glass, but is too bright to tell what is giving off the light.  With a strong blow, the glass may be breakable.

objects.short: the bracelet of the consecrated spirit
objects.ground: A small bracelet made of stone and gold beads is lying on the ground.

extras.text: The bracelet is formed from small beads of gold and grayish colored stones. It is very old and shows the marks from years of use.  The stone beads are cracked and worn down on the edges and a few of them have chipped apart.  The gold beads are starting to tarnish and fade, almost matching the dull luster of the stone, from prolonged contact with the sweat from the skin.

objects.ground: A thick, dark mask is lying on the ground, with a small cloud of smoke surrounding it.

extras.text: The mask is not built from a solid material, but formed from a thick, dark cloud of smoke.  The outline of the mask, as well as the eye holes can be seen and even felt, giving it the illusion of being solid.  The smoke that swirls around it is vividly dark and gloomy, creating a supernatural look.  There are no apparent straps used to leash it to your face.  It seems that the smoke is wrapping around your hands as if to hold on, so it might do the same for your face.

objects.ground: A pristine sword is lying on the ground, iridescent in the light.

extras.text: The iridescent sword gleams in the light, almost like its giving off some light of its own.  The brilliant Damascus forged two sided blade is split down the middle with a blood groove, from tip to shoulder.  The handle of the sword is wrapped in what looks to be dragon skin, sewn together with a golden twine. There is a small inscription on the pommel.
May the Iridescent Sword guide your way to victory against the wicked.

objects.ground: Testing...testing...1..2..3..
A shimmering glint of light shines from a small chain on the ground.

extras.text: A small ball of light glows from an unknown source, but somehow still remains attached to a shining platinum chain.  It looks like a common necklace, except for the small glint of light that emits tiny beams that illuminate the palm of your hand.  Occasionally the light grows brighter for an instant, then fades back to normal.

objects.ground: A key is stuck into the ground, teetering with a small bend.

extras.text: The key is molded out of thick steel that has been worn and weathered down to a dark haze color.  There is a small bend in the round shank of the key, that just might prevent if from opening the lock it was crafted for.

objects.ground: A vial containing a dull red liquid rests here, attached to a leather strap.

extras.text: The red liquid inside the vial is very thick and slowly slides around when moved.  The glass that it is constructed from shows its age, for it holds many scratches and chips, but yet is unbroken.  At the point of attachment of the strap there is a thick piece of leather, pressed with a symbol of a dragon, which wraps around the cap, sealed with some sort of wax like substance. There is some small print on the strap.
A vial of blood, captured and sealed, from a dying dragon.

objects.ground: A small trinket of tattered leather has been discarded onto the ground.

extras.text: The small scrap of leather has been worn beyond belief.  Its edges are frayed and it is very soft to the touch.  There is a very small portion of a picture that is crafted onto it, lending to the certainty that it is from a larger piece of artwork.  Judging from the condition of the leather, this has been around a long time, and held regularly as someone's good luck trinket.

objects.ground: A dark and dull earring lies on the ground, covered with shadows.

extras.text: The earring looks to be formed from some sort of mist or shadow like substance, but is still firm to the touch.  It emits a very small quantity of smoke, which would go unnoticed without careful examination.  The earring is constantly changing shape, flowing and varying in an ominous way.

objects.ground: A dingy key lies on the ground, almost out of sight.

extras.text: This key has been out of use for some time.  It looks as if it were stashed in a wet location for years, as the mildew and mold has taken control of its surface.

objects.ground: A chest built of grey stone rests along the wall, lit by candles at its base.

extras.text: The stone in this chest is the same drab grey stone from the walls of the Sacred Haven.  The layer of dust covering the top of the chest is extremely thick, having not been opened for years.

objects.ground: A burnt wooden chest, blackened by soot, rests in the middle of the chamber.

extras.text: The chest was once a beautiful wooden masterpiece with intricate carvings and inlaid symbols, but it has been burnt and blacked by some sort of fire. All of the wood has been charred black and the metal latches seem to have been melted somewhat.  The chest is still very sturdy and shows no signs of being forced open.

objects.ground: A cast-iron weapons rack rests against the wall, collecting dust.

extras.text: The cast iron rack is dull black and is very clean.  There are signs of heavy use, as the hinges and some of the metal have started to wear down.  You can see just a lone sword resting in the rack, barely visible behind the clasp that holds the weapons in place.

objects.ground: Three large silver levers stick out of the ground beside the door to the south.

extras.text: The three levers are the locking mechanism for the door to the south.  Each are built of finely polished silver and have a black leather handle on top. In order to unlock the door, it seems you must pull them in a specific order. They are labeled left, center and right.

objects.ground: A carved piece of dark black wood lies on the ground.

extras.text: The dark grains of the wood spiral throughout the length of the key, creating a very striking contrast to the lighter colors of wood that they wrap through.  The key has been carved very thick and the teeth are somewhat squared off.  It is so large that it sticks out of both sides of you hand when you grip it.

objects.ground: Some multicolored glints catch your eye, sparkling up at you from the ground.

extras.text: The jewels that are inlaid into this key are flawless.  There are at least five different colored gems that make up the head and there are smaller sized gems that are set into the metal all the way down to the tip.  Even the teeth of the key are formed from small square cut gemstones.

objects.ground: A dark black, metal key lies here waiting to be picked up.

extras.text: The large, dark black key is very clean, and looks almost to be new.  The black casting of the metal gives it a very durable finish and it looks to be unused.  Whoever was the keeper of this key did a very good job of protecting it from the elements.

objects.ground: A well-balanced consecrated hammer stands here.

extras.text: This hammer is not a weapon, but a tool.  Although it could do some serious damage in a fight, the weight is misaligned for combat and the head too small for solid hits.  A trained eye can spot that is because the hammer's true purpose is creation, not destruction.  Blessed by spirits of the earth for working on grand design of the universe, this hammer is a perfect tool for a true forgemaster.

objects.ground: A polished trumpet stands proudly here.

extras.text: This kind of trumpet is traditionally used for heraldry to announce the coming of knights or kings.  While well cared for, it bears clear signs of regular use.  If it could speak, what stories of nobility and honor would it tell?

objects.ground: A long staff formed of electricity sparks and sizzles on the ground.

extras.text: The blue and white bolts crackle and sizzle, but still are bound together to form a staff.  The top of the staff burns the brightest and emits an occasional shower of sparks.  It is constantly shifting colors and shape, allowing the user to control it actions to achieve maximum damage.

triggers.name: group_armor_forgemaster_greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 set stage %actor.quest_stage[group_armor]% if ((%actor.class% /= Cleric && %actor.level% > 72) || (%actor.class% /= Priest && %actor.level% > 56)) && %stage% == 0 mecho %self.name% says, 'Well hello and welcome to the Sacred Haven's forge! mecho &0My name's Galen, son of Thorgrim, of the clan Grugnir.  I'm the resident mecho &0Forgemaster of the Sacred Haven.' wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'I'm working to prepare the paladins of the Haven mecho &0for their campaign against the evil races staking out Bluebonnet Pass by mecho &0forging an icon that will cast Group Armor.' wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'Are you interested in helping out?' mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'You'll be able to learn the spell for yourself in the mecho &0process.' elseif %stage% == 1 say Have you returned with items that cast armor? elseif %stage% == 2 say I hope you've sourced a new forging hammer! elseif %stage% == 3 || %stage% == 4 say Any luck communing with the spirits of the forge? elseif %stage% == 5 say How goes the search for a protective amulet? elseif %stage% == 6 mecho %self.name% says, 'Welcome back!  I see the ghosts haven't eaten you yet! mecho &0Have you brought any ethereal armor?' endif

triggers.name: group_armor_forgemaster_speech
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[group_armor]% wait 2 if ((%actor.class% /= Cleric && %actor.level% > 72) || (%actor.class% /= Priest && %actor.level% > 56)) if %stage% == 0 quest start group_armor %actor.name% say Then welcome aboard! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'First, I need four things that cast the Armor mecho &0spell to amplify my prayers to Moradin:' mecho &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[6118]%&0 mecho &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[11704]%&0 mecho &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[11707]%&0 mecho &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[16906]%&0 wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Moradin watch over your travels! mecho &0If you need an update, ask me about your &7&b[progress]&0.' elseif %stage% == 1 say Let me see what you have! elseif %stage% == 2 say Thank you so much! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Bring back a forging hammer and then I can tell mecho &0you what to do next.' elseif %stage% == 3 || %stage% == 4 say Let me test out the new hammer then! elseif %stage% == 6 say Let me see what you've brought! endif elseif ((%actor.class% /= Cleric && %actor.level% < 72) || (%actor.class% /= Priest && %actor.level% < 56)) mecho %self.name% says, 'I don't think you're quite ready to be a forge mecho &0acolyte yet.' laugh msend %actor% %self.name% claps you on the back with his mighty hand! mechoaround %actor% %self.name% claps %actor.name% on the back with his mighty hand. elseif %actor.class% != Cleric || %actor.class% != Priest mecho %self.name% says, 'You may wish to prove your worth but I can only mecho &0work with those dedicated to divinity.' endif

triggers.name: group_armor_forgemaster_receive
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[group_armor]% switch %stage% case 1 if %object.vnum% == 6118 || %object.vnum% == 11704 || %object.vnum% == 11707 || %object.vnum% == 16906 if %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:%object.vnum%]% == 1 return 0 say You already brought me %object.shortdesc%! else quest variable group_armor %actor.name% %object.vnum% 1 wait 2 mjunk %object.name% wait 2 say Aye, this'll do. set item1 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:6118]% set item2 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:11704]% set item3 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:11707]% set item4 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:16906]% if %item1% && %item2% && %item3% &&%item4% quest advance group_armor %actor.name% wait 2 say That looks like everything! emote places the four objects near the altar. wait 4s say Bad news though. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'The Haven was attacked by orcs from Bluebonnet Pass mecho &0while you were gone!' wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Fortunately no one was killed, but I had to use mecho &0my consecrated forging hammer to defend myself.  It's no good for works of mecho &0holy creation now.' wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Since I need to fix up the forge after the attack mecho &0would you be willing to find me another forging hammer?' else eval total (%item1% + %item2% + %item3% + %item4%) wait 2 if %total% <= 2 say Do you have any of the other items? elseif %total% == 3 say Do you have the last one? endif endif endif else return 0 say %object.shortdesc% doesn't cast Armor ya daffy spriggan! mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. laugh endif break case 2 if %object.vnum% == 8701 wait 2 emote examines the hammer. say This will do! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'To consecrate the hammer again you'll need to mecho &0find a place where the light of the sun reaches deep into the bowels of mecho &0Ethilien and &7&b[commune]&0 with the spirits there.' wait 2 give hammer %actor.name% wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Places where ore and stone are mined often become mecho &0sacred places for us dwarves.' quest advance group_armor %actor.name% else return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say This isn't a forging hammer! endif break case 3 return 0 if %object.vnum% == 59039 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say Where did you find this? wait 1s say This can't be the same hammer you brought me before. elseif %object.vnum% == 8701 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. mecho %self.name% says, 'You need to bring me the consecrated hammer. mecho &0Another mundane forging hammer is useless.' endif break case 4 if %object.vnum% == 59039 quest advance group_armor %actor.name% wait 2 mjunk %object.name% wait 2 say Moradin's flames, this is splendid! wait 1s mecho %self.name% gives the new hammer a few practice swings. say Aye, that's a fine hammer! wait 3s say Let us continue! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'This spell needs to be contained in a holy symbol of mecho &0some kind.  There is an amulet, an Aegis amulet, that would serve well for this mecho &0purpose.' wait 3s say Find it and bring it back here. else return 0 say What in the heck is this? msend %actor% %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif break case 5 if %object.vnum% == 12500 wait 2 mecho %self.name% scrutinizes %object.shortdesc% with a discerning glance. mjunk %object.name% wait 2s nod say Mmhmmm.  Mhmmm. wait 1s say Yes, this will be an excellent divine focus. wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'Finally, I need to capture the intangible protective mecho &0essence of ethereal armor to finish the amulet.  I know of three pieces:' mecho &7&ba breastplate&0 mecho &7&ba ring&0 mecho &7&ba bracelet&0 wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'See if you can find them.  Items like these are mecho &0often worn by the dead as they can interact with them.' wait 2s say Good luck and Moradin guard you! quest advance group_armor %actor.name% else return 0 say This won't be a very effective focus. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif break case 6 if %object.vnum% == 47004 || %object.vnum% == 47018 || %object.vnum% == 53003 if %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:%object.vnum%]% == 1 return 0 say You already brought me %object.shortdesc%! else wait 2 quest variable group_armor %actor.name% %object.vnum% 1 mecho %self.name% places %object.shortdesc% near the altar. mjunk %object.name% wait 1s set item1 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:47004]% set item2 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:47018]% set item3 %actor.quest_variable[group_armor:53003]% if %item1% && %item2% && %item3% grin say With everything gathered, I can get to work! wait 2s mecho %self.name% lays the ethereal breastplate on the anvil. wait 4s mecho %self.name% thrusts his hammer into the forge. mecho %self.name% entones, 'Dwarffather, hear my prayer.' wait 4s mecho %self.name% raises the &1&bglowing&0 hamer. wait 4s mecho %self.name% entones, 'Bless my hammer in this act of Creation.' wait 3s mecho The hammer turns &7&bwhite&0 with holy energy. wait 5s mecho %self.name% brings the hammer down on the ethereal breastplate! mecho The breastplate ripples from the force of the hit like the surface of a lake struck by a drop of water. wait 5s say Now we add the extra magic! wait 2s mecho %self.name% grabs the broom and the hardened stick of leather. mecho %self.name% points them at the ethereal breastplate and releases their magic. wait 4s mecho The ethereal breastplate glows white-hot and starts to sizzle! wait 4s mecho %self.name% takes a pair of tongs and lays the ethereal bracelet on the radiating breastplate. wait 5s mecho %self.name% uncorks the violet potion and pours it over the breastplate. mecho The glow of the breastplate begins to seep into the bracelet! wait 5s say Let Creation ring throughout this hallowed forge! wait 4s mecho %self.name% strikes the ethereal metals again, melding the bracelet into the armor. wait 4s mecho The armor begins to decohere. wait 5s mecho %self.name% places the ethereal ring on the shifting energies. mecho %self.name% pours the green potion over the ring, which quickly dissolves. wait 5s mecho %self.name% strikes the ethereal mass over and over, chanting prayers to Moradin. wait 5s mecho The ethereal energies completely decohere! mecho The forge is filled with hot energy like a basin filled with water. wait 5s mecho %self.name% raises the Aegis amulet over his head. wait 2s say Soul Forger, let this amulet grant us Your protection! wait 4s mecho The Aegis amulet begins to &3&bglow!&0 wait 4s mecho All sound falls away as the radiant energies of the forge are absorbed into the amulet! wait 4s mecho %self.name% places the amulet on the forge anvil. wait 4s mecho With a final ceremonial blow, %self.name% seals the protective energies into their new form! wait 7s mecho Slowly sound returns as the ringing of an anvil. wait 2s mecho %self.name% inspects the new holy amulet. wait 2s say Aye, our work is finished.  Thank you acolyte. emote bows and says, 'May the Dwarffather shield you ever more!' wait 2s quest complete group_armor %actor.name% msend %actor% You feel a stirring in your soul! msend %actor% &7&bMoradin blesses you with the knowledge of Group Armor!&0 mskillset %actor.name% group armor else say Did ya find anything else? endif endif else return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say This isn't going to serve for Group Armor. endif break default return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say What is this for? done

triggers.name: group_armor_hammer_commune
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case c case co case com case comm return 0 halt done if %actor.quest_stage[group_armor]% == 3 && %self.room% == 13358 quest advance group_armor %actor.name% oecho Holding %self.shortdesc% up to the shaft of light, it begins to hum! wait 3s oecho The hammer grows warm. wait 3s oecho %self.shortdesc% begins emitting a soft glowing light! wait 3s oecho %self.shortdesc% becomes as light as a feather but remains as solid as iron. wait 3s oecho %self.shortdesc% floats in the air for a moment before sinking to the ground. wait 2s oecho The humming ceases, leaving the hammer glowing with a faint, ethereal light. oload obj 59039 oforce %actor% get mystic-forging-hammer wait 2 opurge %self% else return 0 endif
